Field Documentation

int hwloc_obj_attr_u::hwloc_cache_attr_s::associativity

Ways of associativity, -1 if fully associative, 0 if unknown.

Depth of cache (e.g., L1, L2, ...etc.)

Cache-line size in bytes. 0 if unknown.
